description_for_human: A headless, accessible, and fully customizable multi-step stepper component for Vue 3. Build complex forms, wizards, and onboarding flows.
description_for_model: Vue Stepper is an npm package (@doderasoftware/vue-stepper) that provides a multi-step wizard/stepper component for Vue 3 applications. It features TypeScript support, responsive design with mobile header, step validation, optional steps, progress tracking, and full UI customization via the :ui prop. Install via: npm install @doderasoftware/vue-stepper. Main component is 'Stepper' which accepts steps array, v-model for current step, and emits 'complete' event. Documentation at https://vue-stepper.doderasoft.com/, source at https://github.com/Dodera-Software/vue-stepper
